root.text_male: Should I trust Alex and go to the toilet to talk to him?
root.text_female: Should I trust Alex and go to the toilet to talk to Anna?

root.text: If I go, will it be over once for all?
I have nothing to do in class.
Really? Don't tell me you were leaving without stopping by the toilet.
Think about it as an opportunity to fix everything. C'mon... I'll walk you there.
